tool_contract.description: Generate HGAP config from pbcommand options.

pb_option.name: Config overrides
pb_option.description: This is intended to allow support engineers to override the config which we will generate from other options. It is a 2-level JSON dictionary, just like hgap-cfg.json. For more details on the available options, see https://github.com/PacificBiosciences/FALCON/wiki/Manual

falcon_ns.task_options.HGAP_Options_JSON.description: This is intended to allow support engineers to override the config which we will generate from other options. It is a 2-level JSON dictionary, just like hgap-cfg.json. For more details on the available options, see https://github.com/PacificBiosciences/FALCON/wiki/Manual
falcon_ns.task_options.HGAP_Options_JSON.title: Config overrides

output_types.title: HGAP JSON file
output_types.description: Output: Actual configuration to be used by HGAP, in a 2-level dictionary.

output_types.title: Python logging.config JSON file
output_types.description: Output: Standard Python logging.config (for the task, not pbsmrtpipe)

tool_contract.name: Tool HgapConfigGenerator
